title: Comparison
text: $$h^2+16>h^2$$ is equivalent to $$\sqrt{h^2+16}>\sqrt{h^2}=h$$. Thus, $$-h-\sqrt{h^2+16}<0$$. Since $$w \geq 0$$, the only solution is $$w=-h+\sqrt{h^2+16}$$
